title: 82x14: Blind Trusts and Application of 5 U.S.C. app. § 202(f)(3)(C)(ii)
summary:
5 U.S.C. app. § 203(f)(3)(c)(ii) prohibits a trustee from holding in trust for any interested party any asset that the interested party is specifically prohibited by law or regulations from holding, even in the context of a blind trust where the interested party would be unaware of the asset acquired by the trustee.  

Notes: [cites former version of 5 U.S.C. app. § 203]
